main event: A dull red object was observed changing to white and made a 180 degree turn at extremely high speed in W. Riverside, California on 21 September 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 7 minutes., The object made a high-speed maneuver with a 180-degree turn., The object changed color from dull red to white., There were no photographs documented in the report., The conclusion noted insufficient data for further analysis.
sighted object: a dull red object changing to white
